channel.title: How do i get barrage!
channel.description:
right iv got this server and in "client" it said ##barrage complete removed##....how do i get it back so i can have it plz tell me
thank you moparscape scape forums rocks!

item.title: How do i get barrage!
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

lmfaozas:

Wrong section.There allways are some noobs with Junior member status and 10 rep that are fake…Those noobs post requests in tutorials section.You are one of them,and because of noobs like you, this forum is going to hell…

At least help him. We were like that once, didn’t know what to do. New to the Community.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get barrage!
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Find this

if(magicID == 12881) // ice burst (lvl 70 spell)

You should see

if(magicID == 12881) // ice burst (lvl 70 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -74 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 15)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 15)==true))
{
startAnimation(1979);
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(24);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle();
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
stillgfx(363, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 10); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 10); 
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 15);  
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 74)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 75 to cast this spell.");
}
}

Right BELOW THE LAST }
Click enter and add.

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= -92 && playerLevel[3] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); 
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);  
startAnimation(1979);
attackNPCSWithin(369, 39, 0);
//hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(67);
server.npcHandler.PoisonNPC(npcIndex);
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
//stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell.");
}
}

now find


if(spellID == 12881) // ice burst (lvl 70 spell)

You should see

if(spellID == 12881) // ice burst (lvl 70 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= -74) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 15)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 10 "+getItemName(560)+", 10 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 15 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 15)==true)) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(19); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(363, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 10); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 10); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 15); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 74) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 75 to cast this spell."); } }

Right BELOW The last “}” click enter and add

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if(playerLevel[6] > 124)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554));
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true))
{
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(39);
startAnimation(1979);
attackPlayersWithin(369, 39, 10); 
castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer();
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
PkingDelay = 15;
//stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
//castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!");
sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!");
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); 
deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); 
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60);  
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124)
{
sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell.");
}
}

Next time post in the right section please

Read full topic
